name: ColorReplace

description.en: Replaces values in input equal to input From to the input value To.
description.zh: 根据输入值来创建遮罩效果。

info.en: Replace colors within this range from input From
info.zh: 取值范围中的值会被替换

info.en: Soften the edges around the selection
info.zh: 对临界值的判断进行模糊控制

main: vec4 main (vec4 Color, vec4 From, vec4 To, float Range, float Fuzziness) {
return mix(To, Color, clamp((Distance - Range) / max(Fuzziness, -10000.0), 0.0, 1.0));
